plan: Phase 1: Research (2-3h) - Play Integrity verdicts, latency benchmarks, SLA definition.
Phase 2: Documentation (3-4h) - monitoring-strategy.md, production-readiness.md, update qa-tooling-notes.md.
Phase 3: Evidence (1h) - Extract QA-002/003 evidence from existing pipeline (POI-211/213 done).
Phase 4: Close (1h) - Update PDCA, log.jsonl, close POI-103 in board.json.
do: - Pulled metrics from research-notes; populated test-plan.json with scenarios and thresholds (FAR ≤5%, FRR ≤10%, entropy ≥0.75, DP ε≤2).
- Authored qa-tooling-notes.md for telemetry capture and Play Integrity mocks.
- Created qa-generator-plan.md scheduling synthetic data generator work (3-week plan).
- Added telemetry-proto-plan.md describing BatchTelemetry message and baseline capture.
- Captured Pixel 5 + Xiaomi 13T Pro benchmarks; added Light Ledger logcat + hash-chain evidence to POI-QA-001.
Phase 1 (Research) - TODO:
[ ] Review Play Integrity API docs: which verdicts to accept (MEETS_DEVICE_INTEGRITY vs MEETS_STRONG_INTEGRITY)?
[ ] Benchmark end-to-end latency (sensor → Light Ledger → Play Integrity → Upload → Validator): measure p50/p95/p99 for each stage.
[ ] Define SLA: success rate %, latency targets, uptime requirements.
Phase 2 (Documentation) - TODO:
[ ] Write monitoring-strategy.md: metrics to collect, alert rules, retention policies, dashboard requirements.
[ ] Write production-readiness.md: quality gates, performance baselines, security requirements, failure modes & fallbacks.
[ ] Update qa-tooling-notes.md: konkretyzacja tooling (nie tylko 'Grafana + PagerDuty', ale które dashboards, jakie metryki).
Phase 3 (Evidence) - TODO:
[ ] Extract QA-002 evidence: 2-3 successful Play Integrity verifications from validator logs (POI-213 done → mamy STATUS_ACCEPTED!).
[ ] Extract QA-003 evidence: validator gRPC response samples (partial - without Solana as POI-205 pending).
[ ] Optional: QA-004 resilience testing (może skip do POI-204).
Phase 4 (Close) - TODO:
[ ] Update PDCA do/check/act with completion details.
[ ] Add final log.jsonl entry documenting POI-103 closure.
[ ] Update board.json: POI-103 status in_progress → done, add closed_at.
check: - Play Integrity verdicts decision documented (which verdicts acceptable?).
- End-to-end latency benchmarked: p50/p95/p99 for sensor→validator flow.
- SLA defined: success rate %, latency targets, uptime %.
- monitoring-strategy.md exists: metrics, alerts, retention, dashboards specified.
- production-readiness.md exists: quality gates, baselines, security reqs, failure modes.
- qa-tooling-notes.md updated with concrete tooling details.
- test-plan.json updated: QA-002 has evidence (Play Integrity success rate).
- test-plan.json updated: QA-003 has evidence (validator response samples).
✅ Dokument test-plan z kryteriami (test-plan.json + evidence for 4 scenarios).
act: - Hand off to POI-204 (QA Tooling implementation): build tools from POI-103 framework (synthetic generator, telemetry stream, Grafana dashboards).
- Monitor production uploads for 1-2 days: validate Play Integrity success rate ≥99%, batch latency p95 ≤30s.
- Collaborate with Nodus on POI-203 (CloudHSM provisioning): ensure monitoring covers HSM metrics.
- Plan POI-206 (Attestation Integration): use POI-103 quality gates as acceptance criteria.
- Before POI-209 (Deployment): verify all POI-103 quality gates met in staging environment.

blockers_resolved: POI-213 done → TLS validator operational, Play Integrity working
POI-211/212 done → Android client ready for evidence collection
